{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated **\$1.9M in 2021-2022** on contracts with THE MATHWORKS.

Across 211 contracts active since the start of the 2017-2018 fiscal year, 14 have at least one amendment (7%). Of contracts with amendments, the average increase in dollar value was 128% and the average number of amendments was 1.43. Cumulatively these amendments represent an increase of \$1.2M over the original contract values.

The average contract duration was 0.79 years, and the average contract value (not including contracts under \$10k) was \$49.5K. The longest contract was 10.2 years. The largest contract by value (including amendments) was \$1.3M.

{{< /entity_summary >}}
